attributes.action: invest in research designed to automate the London Underground Tube network.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The technology exists to enable us to completely automate the running of the Underground trains on London's Tube network. Indeed similar technology is currently already used on the DLR service. 

The Government needs to break the strangleholds that Unions like RMT have on it. When Rail Unions are allowed to bring the capital to a stand still over issues such as job insecurity which the rest of us simply have to live with then change is overdue.

Automating the Underground network would increase reliability and efficiency. It would also release a great deal of inflated salary money which could be invested back into improving the infrastructure.

London needs a transport system capable of meeting the demands of the 21st Century and the Tube is a vital component.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
